website_summaries.verdict: A well-constructed and sturdy, yet very comfortable, massage recliner. Offers excellent value for money.
pros: Easy to operate via the remote
The chair features two massage zones, in the back and seat, which can be operated independently or in sync
Use the side lever to fully recline this chair
cons: Some users found it too small to benefit them

customer_reviews.title: It's ok!
customer_reviews.text: The first one I bought broke the first few days of using. When I leaned back, I leaned all the way to the ground. I knew this wasn't normal so I contacted them and they sent me a new one within the week. The service was great and they responded promptly., The second one is just right but when I rock back and forth, there's s squeaking sound coming from the bottom of the chair and that's annoying! It's comfortable but still not perfect with the squeaking. I paid money for it regardless and would like a recliner that is..."just right"
customer_reviews.author: Texas01

customer_reviews.title: absolutely HORRIBLE!!
customer_reviews.text: absolutely HORRIBLE!!!! bought this for christmas and not even a month later we had noticed the chair was going more side ways and when you sit down you were being sucked in by the collapsed side so we finally took it apart to see what the issue was and if it was fixable but instead we found broken wood inside that wasn't even keeping the screws in place hence why it was falling to the left side and it isn't fixable because this was absolutely broken in pieces. waste of money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Biljana

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price. Was not able to use the massage for a couple of weeks, because power adapter was missing. Replaced by the company, for free with no issues but it took a little time. In fact, massage is stronger than I expected for the price. What I don't like is the chair is full of static. I've tried rubbing it with dryer sheets and have a humidifier going 24/7, but it's like wearing a wool sweater as far as shock factor. It is comfy and reclines fully.
customer_reviews.author: PK Mc

customer_reviews.title: And it is fantastic! The box was huge- and a little beat ...
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow!!! I ordered this for my Dad- He's about 5'4" and maybe 150 pounds. And it is fantastic! The box was huge- and a little beat up- but the chair was fine. It required no tools to put together and probably took me a total of ten minutes to unpack and put together. It may have taken me longer to break down the box than it did to put the chair together. It is also very, very comfortable. Yay Amazon! You may be taking over the world, but at least in my short-sighted opinion, I love you!
customer_reviews.author: mrs. cravitz

customer_reviews.title: Broke without hard wear
customer_reviews.text: This chair WAS great (especially for the money). However, now it isn't. The back completely broke (it didn't come apart, it broke), the wood snapped in it where bolts holding the metal brackets were secured. My husband weighs less than 200lbs and is the largest person who sits in the chair. The wood in the back of the chair holding the supports broke. We had it 9 months when this happened. It was sat in on average once a day for 30 minutes (sometimes not reclined). It wasn't used hard/abused. Very disappointing. The fabric did wear very well and it was very comfortable. However, the internal components and structure need redesigned and worked on!
customer_reviews.author: Denise D.

customer_reviews.title: I Like the. Microfiber fabric color
customer_reviews.text: I Like the. Microfiber fabric color. Matched my other furniture. Recliner does sit Low. arrived undamaged. Massage unit is loud. I like that when you recline, there is no gap, where. The footrest comes up. It's a Little narrow in width. Let you know how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H

customer_reviews.title: Dorel Living Padded Dual Massage Recliner, Chocolate
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my son for his bday. He LOVES it! Says the vibrating feels so good! It's where he does everything now! I've truly made his room into a man-cave as I never see him anymore! And he's in charge of dinner! LOL. Guess it was one of mom's BETTER gifts and I'm a GREAT gifter anyway. This one TOPS them all according to him. I have to admit it does look comfy. When mine officially dies, I'll try his and if it "fits" mom, I would most definitely consider getting one for me! With fibromyalgia I would LOVE one that vibrates! This one was a GREAT price!
customer_reviews.author: Southern gal

customer_reviews.title: My hubby loves this chair.
customer_reviews.text: My husband is 5'11" approx 240 lbs this chair fits him perfectly. Very nice quality for the money. The massage portion is a bit more of a vibration but after 30 minutes in the chair his stresses from the day just melt away. Chair is super easy to assemble and the padding is really good. We looked over the chair quite thoroughly very well made, nothing broken and no bugs as other reviewers mentioned. Very happy with this purchase and would recommend it. Plan on getting another one soon. Delivery was estimated between the 12th and 17th but got it on the 11th. Save yourself the extra $400 on those other brands, this one is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: A. Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Great chair.
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is microfiber tan with nicely stitched lines. Assembly was pretty easy, even without instructions. I believe, the directions fell out of the box in transit. The chair tilts back further than I thought. Therefore, I have it about foot +/- away from the wall to accommodate the tilt. The handle to raise the footrest is easy to use. I love the rocker function - the chair does not swivel. The cushions are plump and firm. I believe, the chair will hold its shape and firmness. Lastly, the vibration works well, but it is louder than I would like. I don't see myself using it. Great chair for the price.
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: Great random find!
customer_reviews.text: We got this chair for my son's nursery and it's amazing. It's super comfortable, comfortable enough to sleep in, and very easy to clean up when it gets spills on it. I bought it kind of randomly after searching for one at several different stores and I'm so glad I did. It's only been 4 months but we have moved in that time period and it's still held up great.
customer_reviews.author: JennnTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Bedbugs
customer_reviews.text: It is an awful experience!When I bought the chair,I found some people bought the bedbug medicine also. Yes!The Product contains bedbug,which bites me and left 8 red spots. Since last week,I cannot stand it anymore. I bought the bedbug killer. Now my home smells like a chemical lab. My right arm was bite last Friday and attach the photos just took.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warranty is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in july. Took 2 weeks for shipping, easy to put together, massage is loud but ok. Started having issues with leg not going down. Had it about 6 months, 12 yr old was sitting in it, attempted to put legs up, loud pop noise and he almost fell out on left side. Flipped over and frame was cracked broken. Reached out to amazon, given phone number to call for 1 yr waranty was tol need to email manuf number and pictures videos and several other items. Sent over same day. 10 minutes later got same email saying i needed to do better job and resend it..what?? Will not purchase again. Help me amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: It came early and I love it! It's really comfortable! The vibration is a little loud but that's fine by me.
customer_reviews.author: melinda joy

customer_reviews.title: RETURN POLICY, RETURN WITHIN 30 DAYS OR NO REFUND
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT THIS DOREL RECLINER, IT CAME FROM "DEALS DEPOT LLC" IN FEBRUARY2018 AND IT BROKE IN JULY 2018 AND BECAUSE IT WAS BEYOND THE 30 DAY RETURN WINDOW THEY REFUSED TO DO ANYTHING ABOUT IT, READ THE OTHER 312 BAD REVIEWS ABOUT THE SAME MAKE RECLINER. SEVERAL OF THEM HAVE THE SAME COMPLAIN. WHY WOULD YOU ONLY WARRANT A PRODUCT THAT SHOULD LAST AT LEAST A YEAR FOR ONLY 30 DAYS UNLESS YOU KNEW IT WOULD NOT HOLD UP. DO NOT BUY THIS CHAIR ARE YOU WILL REGRET IT
customer_reviews.author: cornelius

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad, Actually Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Not bad at all. But not for real big people. Apparently company read reviews, because recliner came well packaged. Box was partially destroyed in shipping, but inside was covered in large amount of bubble wrap. I don't use, nor set up, the vibration mechanism, so have no comment on that. Also, the color is slightly darker than the photo. The one flaw I saw was that recliner has four feet that might damage carper or flooring underneath. I bought a small, nice looking throw rug for under recliner, and that solves that possible problem.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: For the money this has turned out to be a great purchase. My grandbaby loves his "big fat rocker" and we use it daily. I also nap in the chair when he goes down for his nap. I had a guest who needed to sleep upright and he sat and slept in the rocker. He took the info about this purchase home with him and hopes to buy one. All equipment was in the box. Delivery and tracking notices were accurate. Great buy even if all it lasts is a year (or longer). I use a double fitted sheet for a cover - works great.
customer_reviews.author: Beck

customer_reviews.title: Nice but a little difficult
customer_reviews.text: The box it came in looked like it was kicked down a dirty ally . When I open the box the recliner was dirty the two metal slots that would have been easy to assemble wear uneven and I found it very difficult to put together the massager on the seat worked well but the one on the back was vibrating so loud I couldn't even hear the TV this is a very comfortable recliner and I would have given it 5 stars but it was dirty and I could send it back but just having shoulder surgery there is no way I could lift this and package it up to send it back :(
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Thank God the UPS driver was nice enough to deliver there
customer_reviews.text: Lucky for me I was existing my house when the UPS driver was delivering. Since the UPS drive saw I was old and disabled he tried to put it through my back door and it would not fit. It had to go though my front door. Thank God the UPS driver was nice enough to deliver there. Not the greatest chair but OK for the price.
customer_reviews.author: RICK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent chair
customer_reviews.text: We bought 1 a couple years ago to "fill" a space. The chair looks great and is extremely comfortable. (Its my gransons favorite chair). We needed a few more chairs now for a new room and for our grandsons room. I looked into several name brands, different prices, and options. Ended up buying 2 more of these. They are smaller in width than most recliners, but its not a notable consern . I highly recommend them. They are comfortable, look nice, and half the price of most recliners. I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: lm

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: VERY disappointed in these chairs. They look like they're big comfy chairs but they're not. Also, the vibrator in one of them makes an awful, loud noise. It's hard to hear the TV with it on. I feel like I wasted my money and of course, to box it up and ship it back would take a magician! I would not recommend these to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: dks

customer_reviews.title: i am a larger guy (6ft 1 inch 320 lbs) and i sit and recline in it comfortably. strong and sturdy construction
customer_reviews.text: wife loves this. this was purchased for our baby nursery. she is a smaller woman and is able to curl up on it to sleep sometimes. i am a larger guy (6ft 1 inch 320 lbs) and i sit and recline in it comfortably. strong and sturdy construction. easily assembled. massager isnt the greatest , but thats not what we purchased it for.
customer_reviews.author: shane

customer_reviews.title: Loud, creaking chair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair to rock my newborn daughter in. I was very happy initially, the chair is very comfy, but after only having the chair for a couple of weeks it started making a loud creaking noise when you rock in it. Unfortunately, the chair doesn't help my daughter fall asleep now, it keeps her awake. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: M. Crowley

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart.  Now in trash.
customer_reviews.text: This arrives in two pieces; you attach the back to the base and connect a couple wires, easy as that. As for the massage feature itself, the chair essentially virates in the seat and/or lower back. It's less than 3 years later, and the chair has broken. The parts where the brackets attach at the base of the back piece have come loose; the screws essentially bent and the wood where they attached was particle board that has come apart and fell out of the fabric covering. The chair is now in the trash. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: They do not last more than a year
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 2 of these on August 17, 2017 so they are less than a year old. They were pretty comfortable at first and they closed from a reclining position easily. Now though, neither stays in a reclining position and the back padding on both feels like it has disintegrated. The back of the chairs feel like you are like sitting on coat hangars. I would not recommend these chairs. They do not last more than a year - save the cost and invest in a better chair.
customer_reviews.author: Julianna

customer_reviews.title: Good rocker recliner
customer_reviews.text: This chair is a good rocker recliner; it's comfortable to sit in. It is soft as it is microfiber. Easy to put down the foot rest. I personally would prefer the arm rests to be a little taller, though. The massager is a simple vibration in the seat part and another for the back part. Overall, it's a good rocker recliner, especially for the price of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was a good buy but the padding on the arms are gone ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a good buy but the padding on the arms are gone it's like the batting have been pushed to the side. Cause when I put my arms on it it feels like a board under my arm.
customer_reviews.author: Magentry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Some features I love are padded/stuffed but not ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today. Perfect. Some features I love are padded/stuffed but not overly so. Comfy. Vertical cushions on the back do not bend your head forward. Rocker and massage are a plus. Price was fantastic. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S W

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Back broke within 4 months. On left side, the back hinges totally separated, screws broken, with no way to fix it. The supporting screw broke in half inside the chair. For the price I expected at least a year out of it. But I’ve seen others complain of this Exact Same problem now and I can’t return it or get a replacement. Spend another $100 on a Better chair and envoy it Longer!
customer_reviews.author: Kristiana Beard

customer_reviews.title: FOR THE PRICE- WELL WORTH THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: VERY CONFORTABLE, HAD TO GET USED TO THE FEEL OF THE MATERIAL, SOFT LIKE CRUSHED VELVET. MASSAGE UNIT IS GOOD, BUT IT IS ON UPPER BACK AND/OR POSTERIOR, WOULD HAVE LIKED IT ON LOWER BACK. NICE WITH INDEPENDENT CONTROLS, WITH HIGH/LOW SETTINGS. HAS A SECURE FEELING OF OVER STUFFING. KINDA HARD TO PUSH DOWN FOOT SECTION.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Good recliner for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Had this chair for a week and it is very comfortable. Love the rocking feature when closed. Opens and closes easily in the recline positions. Goes all the way back for a quick nap. The massage is more of a vibration, which is why I took a star away. It provides a low and high setting for both the back and the seat, which is a nice feature, but it is a bit on the loud side without any real massaging taking place.
customer_reviews.author: MKP

customer_reviews.title: Very cpomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Chair is very comfortable and vibration is just enough for slight massage. After reading some of the reviews, I did order the Protection Plan - just in case. I am elderly and short but have no trouble raising and lowering footrest.
customer_reviews.author: weeser

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: This chair has not held up at all. I've owner this chair for less than 2 years. It now is leaning towards one side and will not rock properly. The chair seems poorly constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Rawr

customer_reviews.title: I don't think you will find a similar chair at such a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting the chair to be of the quality and comfort it most definitely has. I am extremely satisfied and recommend it highly to all. I think I will fall asleep tonight sitting in my new easy chair with the vibrator on. What a bargain !!
customer_reviews.author: wascalwabbit

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this chair is very nice and good quality. I ordered this when I had hip replacement surgey and had problems sleeping, at first. I am impressed with the quality and comfort as well and the massage that is included. So glad I bought this. By the way, this chair is great if you have limited space.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Great chair and cannot beat the price...
customer_reviews.text: You definitely need some type of cushion for head/neck in this because there is not enough support for my neck.If I happened to fall asleep in this chair I will wake up with a cramp in my neck.Also the chair only snaps close on one side(right side) and it does not let out all the way back like it shows in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: KK indeed

customer_reviews.title: This was not quite what I expected. The main ...
customer_reviews.text: This was not quite what I expected. The main objection is that it doesn't really lock into place when you go way back so one must be careful not to fall forward. Also, one has to use legs to push it back to sitting position. The lever doesn't do it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Mantel

customer_reviews.title: Get a chaise recliner instead. Especially if you're big and/or taller. Lousy comfort and quality 👎
customer_reviews.text: This chair sucks and doesn't look like the picture IRL. Don't purchase for taller men. The cushion and comfort leave a lot to be desired. My feet hang well over the edge and I'm only 6'1" ... get a chaise recliner instead 😏
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An offer I couldn't refuse.
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's a great deal with much comfort. No complaints here. I usually don't buy recliners on line without trying them out first at the store but I read the review's and was convinced to take a chance and it worked out great, free shipping which stores usually don't offer when you go there. I just hope it stands up to the wear and tear of time. Seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: Dave777

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, assembled very easy. Works well and is comfortable. The only negative thing I can say is that my other recliner sat higher and had a wider seat area. Those are only personal preference so it depends on what your needs are. Definitely good for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Karen R.

customer_reviews.title: EASY OF ASSEMBLY
customer_reviews.text: WAS EASY TO ASSEMBLE, I DID IT ALONE AM 77. THEY REC 2 PEOPLE. VERY COMFORTABLE. I AM 5' 9" OR DEPENDS ON WHO IS MEASURING ME WHEN I GO TO DOCTOR. A LITTLE LOW BUT NOT A BIG DEAL. IF IT LAST 2 OR MORE YEARS? WE SHALL C.
customer_reviews.author: GDAN

customer_reviews.title: the upholstery smells bad like chemicals
customer_reviews.text: well it stank up my whole apartment i put it outside for a month to air out no wonder they cant sell em in california something to do with the stuffing still keep a sheet over it ..... works ok after 6 months im 265 lbs the vibration motor is cheap ofset electric motor in a plastic housing that came loose but was able to zip tie it back tight cheap chair that works great for a smoker lol
customer_reviews.author: patrick m.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value
customer_reviews.text: Uneven padding that hurts back muscles, back is too angled for comfort. Now something has sprung in the bottom making it more difficult to raise the leg rest.
customer_reviews.author: Value Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great plush vibrating recliner.
customer_reviews.text: We sold the last recliner due to its age and getting a new home. My wife specifically picked out this recliner to replace it. Color as advertised, super comfy, reclines, and vibrates on top and bottom. The vibrating is amazing. It isn't quite a massage, but it defiantly relieves pressure points and relaxes you! May get another soon to have his and hers!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Bryant

customer_reviews.title: You can fix your chair if it leans and love it again!
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 recliners.I loved the recliner! My husbands how ever started to lean to the right. Then wouldn’t recline. We took it apart. Took the back off of chair. Tightened bolts in back lower part. Chairs durable and fell in love with them again!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Steinbach

customer_reviews.title: Doable for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my mother who is in memory care unit. She seems comfortable enough but does her weight of about 100 pounds can not hold the chair in full recline (does not "lock"). So for the price it does most of what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Jack O Lantern

customer_reviews.title: Not for someonr with a bad back.
customer_reviews.text: Too low to the gloor hard to get out of when you have a bad back. Sorry I het it.
customer_reviews.author: Blue431

customer_reviews.title: It's just OK
customer_reviews.text: The chair is nice and compact. Easy to put together. The seat is very narrow, enough room for one average size person. Nice material and well made. The massage is more just a vibration, it's very rough and very loud. It's ok depending on what you're looking for.
customer_reviews.author: strbryshrtck

customer_reviews.title: I love it, it is so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought my son this recliner for Christmas and he is on it almost 24/7. I love it, it is so comfortable. My son did say though not good to sleep on it all night got a little uncomfortable, but other than that great purchase. I will be back for more Very satisfied customer Jean Watertown, Ma
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best feature of this chair is the soft
customer_reviews.text: The best feature of this chair is the soft, plush feeling that it gives you when you sit in it. It is very relaxing and the tan color fits a neutral color scheme very well. I purchased this more for the look that the massage feature, and for the value it is a great find. It looks rather stylish and pricey though it is quite affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Vibrations may not be included
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I want for sits and reclining. My chocolate colored ones butt vibrator sounds like a bad motor though. Delivering it up my stairs and because it suits my main desire I will not return
customer_reviews.author: Gatsby

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my purchase. Quality for the price was surprising. It came well packaged. It isn't huge and bulky compared to others. Didn't buy for massage, that was a small bonus. It is more of a vibration than a massage. Still, very pleased with the overall product! Would recommend covering upholstery for longevity, though.
customer_reviews.author: Katie P.

customer_reviews.title: Works great and is comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This recliner has been one of the best chairs I have ever bought it has lasted longer than a recliner I bought at Ashley furniture. It has held up thru my illness and two granddaughters and still looks good. I recommend it if you’re looking for comfort and durability .
customer_reviews.author: RDS

customer_reviews.title: Sucky Chair.  Switch is broken after just 9 months
customer_reviews.text: Great chair. The massage motor on the bottom needed tightening though. Update. Here it is 9 months later and the switch to the bottom massage unit broke! I am not happy at all as I have no way to return or replace the chair.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gaylord

customer_reviews.title: perfect chair for nursing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair for my son nursery, perfect chair for nursing. It is very comfortable, I often nap in it with my son. I gave one less star bc the massage features are really just loud vibrations. I didn't buy the chair for massage purposes. Would recommend this chair as a regular recliner!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought two chairs one is fine the other the arm feels crushed
customer_reviews.text: Bought two chairs one is fine the other the arm feels crushed. They have t been used hardly at all. Feels like the wood in the arm just designated. Would NOT BUY AGAIN!!! No way to fix it or have it fixed without taking it apart. No wonder they quit selling them
customer_reviews.author: kathi burnett

customer_reviews.title: It's a chair. It reclines. It is comfy. What more do you want?
customer_reviews.text: I did not bother hooking up the vibrator. We don't want that part. The chair is comfy and seems well put together. Definintely a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: ronster

customer_reviews.title: Inferior product
customer_reviews.text: absolutely inferior. vibrate worked for 60 seconds. whoever said 6 ft 3 in frame fit is out of their mind. I used that review before purchase. I am 5"10in and too long. I sent back the day after delivery and am awaiting refund. I will not purchase through amazon another bulky item. It is really pain in the butt to repackage to return. Like a pair of shoes. Try out before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Gary C. Atkins

customer_reviews.title: So far so good,
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today, easy to put together and very comfortable. It's a rocker/recliner. The 'massage' feature is more of a 'vibrate' and I probably won't use it, but i didn't buy it for that anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: From reading previous reviews it sounded like a joke and I bough the chair to elevate ...
customer_reviews.text: Legs it sits on are skimpy. Disconnected The vibrating portion. From reading previous reviews it sounded like a joke and I bough the chair to elevate legs and feet and it meets every need. Works well with my other furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Catheirne

customer_reviews.title: Don't Hold Up Well but Great for Price
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED these recliners at first. We got two. However, I'm a SAHM to a toddler and an infant. After just a couple months of constant use, all the fluff is gone and I'm feeling the frame. If it gets works, I'll probably have to get a foam pad to put over the seat. For the price, these chairs do their job.
customer_reviews.author: EJ Watson

customer_reviews.title: Seat height not specified
customer_reviews.text: Item seat very short too close to ground,chair width too small look of chair good fabric nice just not made for anyone over5'6""tall i am 5'11" way tyo small for me
customer_reviews.author: tmcondie

customer_reviews.title: Broke In Under A Year Almost FELL WHILE RECLINING
customer_reviews.text: Just broke on me today I am very disappointed I almost fell when I was reclining Hasn't even been a full year since I've had it
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: A+A+A+
customer_reviews.text: Great chair, very comfortable. My new tv spot. Only issue is it doesn't lock in to recline. If you sneeze in the recline position you will be ejecting yourself for the chair
customer_reviews.author: Mightymischevous

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Truly a GREAT Value. Really a well made and very comfortable chair.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Besecker

customer_reviews.title: I really don't like this chair it is small and just has vibration
customer_reviews.text: I really don't like this chair it is small and just has vibration. I can hear it when I talk Just a hassle to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed. After two months of very gentle use, the side panel is broken. Of course, just after the return window closed. It was comfortable while it lasted. I would not recommend this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Walter A. Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding bargain on these nice chairs
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are nice. I just got them and put them together (very simple) and i'm sitting in one of the two that I purchased right now writing this review with the vibrator on and love it. Very relaxing and comfortable, seems sturdy and well built. Excellent buy and would definitely recommend these rocker/recliners.
customer_reviews.author: James B Moss

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd lazyboy. It is very sturdy and durable. It will only fit a middle size man. For the price it is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: K. Tarn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing In A Box!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing in a box! Little assembly required! One of the best things I have ever purchased off of Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Dual Massage
customer_reviews.text: Great comfort. My husband sits in this a lot. Massage is fantastic
customer_reviews.author: JAM

customer_reviews.title: Overall satisfying.
customer_reviews.text: For a product this large without having actually seen and sat in, I am very pleased. I am 80 yrs. old and I put it together by myself without any difficulty. Biggest drawback is the center tuft is quite large and doesn't feel right but I'm hoping this will collapse with use.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Steurer

customer_reviews.title: Shocked by quality! Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and great price! The shipping box arrived it rough shape, but the chair was protected with plastic and in perfect condition. We bought this one for our nursery, but plan to buy another for the living room!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan & Brooke Demers

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this chair!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this junk! The price was good, but it stopped working after 2 months, outside the return window, of course.
customer_reviews.author: Donna K

customer_reviews.title: This chair is best for a smaller person
customer_reviews.text: This chair is best for a smaller person. My legs stick out over the foot rest. Just not the same confort as a larger chair would be.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Hickman Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Bad description and very loud.
customer_reviews.text: Hate it. Very loud and it wasn't in the header name that it recliner-rocker. I can't use the rocking part due to going to have hip surgery. To low to the ground!! Don't recommend this chair at all!!! Cheap made explains the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Frank

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy and roomy, but sits a little low to the ground, cheaper and better quality than the local big box stores. Shipping was very fast and a piece of cake to put together. Would but again
customer_reviews.author: Papabear2011

customer_reviews.title: does what it's suppose to
customer_reviews.text: easy to set up and comfortable to sit on. My husband is disable and he takes a lot of naps. When it's time to retire his old chair, he was extremely happy with the new replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves the chair but he he removed the ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the chair but he he removed the "massager" parts. They scared our cats when they were on and were really giving a massage so much as loudly vibrating the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Roaring Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Good size forms small living area.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking item. Watching the seat area for wear to cover. Will let you know in couple of months
customer_reviews.author: Fred T.

customer_reviews.title: Very good chair for the price.
customer_reviews.text: We love this chair and are planning on buying another one. The massage feature is annoying, so if you're buying it for that feature I would pass on this one. We don't use the massage feature at all, we just wanted a comfortable chair.
customer_reviews.author: butterfly

customer_reviews.title: Best chair around
customer_reviews.text: This chair is everything I hoped it would be, reclines nice and easy, massager feature works very well, and was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: It's sturdy enough for a large person and is very soft ...
customer_reviews.text: This chair fits me just right. It's sturdy enough for a large person and is very soft and plush. So far it has resisted any staining and the one time I spilled a little water on the arm, the water balled up and was easily wiped off. It also looks nice, the massager works perfectly, and reclines to a comfortable position. I have fallen asleep several times in it. All in all a very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: kat587

customer_reviews.title: ... replacement for a previous recliner and is just as comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for a previous recliner and is just as comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Charton

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for the price
customer_reviews.text: For 250$ you can't go wrong. Just had a baby and wanted a comfy chair. This chair is perfect especially for the price. The massage action is just super powerful vibration. Vibration is kind of loud just FYI.
customer_reviews.author: CMT

customer_reviews.title: But my kids think it's fun. Otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Hard to put the foot rest down. The "massage" is not at all...just a vibration. But my kids think it's fun. Otherwise ok
customer_reviews.author: Big Buyer

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought his & hers.
customer_reviews.text: So comfy. It rocks & reclines. The vibrator is a little loud but soothing.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Moore

customer_reviews.title: Dual Padded Massage Recliner
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this chair purchased by and for her. It is comfortable and the massage is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Hairywolf

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chair
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful chair excellant to relax in when you need to have tired muscles. A great value and price. NO complaints at all. .just praises.
customer_reviews.author: K A MANK

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL CHAIR!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: soft, comfy and overstuffed, great chair, rocks a little between if you need to, goes way back to sleep if you need to!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this chair!!  Poorly constructed!!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this chair in June and it is now Sept 24, the chair is poorly put together. It has already broken and cannot be fixed. My husband was sitting in it the other night, we heard a big pop and the right side broke!! Beware do not purchase!!!!!!!! This is poor construction!!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy chair for the money. Glad I bought it. Took 5 mins to assemble and no tools needed!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Broe

customer_reviews.title: Time wasted
customer_reviews.text: Massger motor burnt out in less than a week. Ordered a replacement and there is a metal piece sticking out the back of the chair that can cause serious injury to those who would catch it on themselves walking behind.
customer_reviews.author: Healing Hearts Ferret Rescue

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great chair very comfortable the massage works good for the price can't beat it....
customer_reviews.author: SGT111

customer_reviews.title: Fits me (5'0" and 115 lbs) NOT too good for hubby (6'0" 200 lbs)
customer_reviews.text: Served its purpose. Fits me (5'0" and 115 lbs) NOT too good for hubby (6'0" 200 lbs)
customer_reviews.author: La Profe

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Decent product.especially for the price. I would have preferred it not be a rocker.which wasn't highlighted in its features
customer_reviews.author: Labo

customer_reviews.title: Not the sturdiest chair-Fine for occasional use
customer_reviews.text: Color as pictured. Not really sturdy enough for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Had it over a year
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big man, at 6'1" and 255 . I plop on this chair everyday...for hours at a time...has held up exceptionally well. Impressed enough to write a review
customer_reviews.author: B. Greider

customer_reviews.title: It is a very nice recliner. Very relaxing
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice recliner. Very relaxing. I purchased it for my dad as a retirement present for his bedroom. It doesn't take up a lot of space but it is a bit low to the ground. Other than that it is a good recliner and my dad loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Phini Webb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs. I bought two of them and they are so comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Relax and let the chair do the work
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Massager is a gem and is soft enough to not hurt. Recline, relax" set the massage timer and type of massage wanted and call it a day
customer_reviews.author: Mona

product_meta.title: Dorel Living Padded Dual Massage Recliner, Chocolate
product_meta.description: Color:ChocolateThe Teagan Armless Accent Chair is the splash of pattern your living space needs to give it a new life. You don’t need to change your entire room décor to make it feel new; all you need is an accent chair that will bring some character to your room without overwhelming it. Beautifully upholstered in a playful pattern of polyester blend fabric, the Teagan Accent Chair will add a hint of visual interest to your living room, entryway, guest room, children's bedroom, or home office. The Teagan features piped fabric edges on the sides of the chair, a slightly curved backrest for comfort, and generous padding in the seat and back for durability. The wood frame and solid wood tapered legs ensure that the Teagan Armless Chair will get years of quality use. Available in multiple color and pattern options to allow you the perfect pop of color for you and your home décor style.
feature_bullets: Traditional zone massage chair with high and low settings.
Massaging located in both the seat and back area. Massaging zones can operate together or separately.
Designed with foam seating for added comfort and durability.
Features a lever release to make reclining easy.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars380 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
